page.title: 12PLANNING OFFICE
page.content:
ON THE 8TH JULY 1985 A GROUP OF US WENT TO THE{PLANNING OFFICE. MR ODAM TOLD US ABOUT{LAND USAGE}IN OUR AREA.
1. AREA OF AGRICULTURAL LAND USED FOR BYPASS IS 22.6 HECTARES (55.9 ACRES) 2. HEIGHT OF NEW BRIDGE WILL BE 24 M. (ABOUT 79 FEET) ABOVE MEAN HIGH WATER SPRING TIDES LEVEL 3. ROUGH ESTIMATE OF LAND USES IN STUDY AREA:
A. {FARM LAND}_ _ _ _ 162 ACRES B. {INDUSTRY} _ _ _ _ 7 ACRES C. {RESIDENTIAL}_ _ _ 270 ACRES D. {SHOPS, OFFICES AND{WHOLESALE}_ _ 24 ACRES E. OTHER (INCLUDING {SCHOOL, HOSPITALS, {OPEN SPACE}ETC.) 111 ACRES
